channel.title: Warhammer Online: Podcast of Reckoning
channel.description: The Podcast of Reckoning (PoR) is a Warhammer Online: Age of Reckoning community podcast hosted by Svoald, Orlock, and Wrenn. The podcast will discuss community news, game updates and mechanics, and include interviews from community leaders and developers. The PoR is produced by Online Gaming Radio in coordination with Warhammer Geek (MMOGeek Network).
channel.itunes:summary: The Podcast of Reckoning (PoR) is a Warhammer Online: Age of Reckoning community podcast hosted by Svoald, Orlock, and Wrenn. channel.itunes:author: Online Gaming Radio
channel.itunes:subtitle: A station about all types of gaming
channel.itunes:keywords: warhammer online, warhammer, warhammer40k, mmorpg, podcast of reckoning, age of reckoning, RPG, games, game mechanics, mmogeek, warhammer geek

item.title: Podcast of Reckoning Episode #5
item.description:
Best of The the Web: - Several highlights about whats been going on in the WAR community since the last Podcast.
The Great Debate: We invite Snafzg from The Greenskin and ChaosCast to join us as special Guest Host to discuss the HUGE news of Mark Jacobs announcements! This is something you dont want to miss!
Community Interview: Weve invited Arcadiea from Guild Vendetta to join us. Hear what makes this Order guild tick, and some very interesting insights on how the guild was built! Thats right! This interview proves that not all guilds play Destruction!

item.title: Podcast of Reckoning Episode #4
item.description:
Join Orlock, Svoald and Wrenn for Episode #4 of the Podcast of Reckoning
In this episode:
Latest News: A few tidbits of news, including the introduction of Wrenn (Warhammer Conflict) joining Orlock and Svoald (Warhammer Geek) as permanent co-host of the Podcast.
Important Program Note: Mid-way through the recording of this episode of the Podcast of Reckoning - Svoald had to leave for his vacation. So, filling in on the main segment is Guest Co-host - Josh Drescher, Associate Producer - Warhammer Online: Age of Reckoning.
Community Interview: We had the honor of talking to Beibhinn from Warhammer Vault about a variety of subjects.

item.title: Podcast Of Reckoning (Episode 3)
item.description: Due to the postponement of this series we have brought you an extended Episode 3! In this episode we cover the May 2008 WAR Newsletter in our main discussion with guest host Wrenn from Warhammer Conflict. In our interview we invite Syp from Waaagh! blog to join us as we ask him many well thought out questions *cough*. We end the podcast with two of our latest parodies. We may even start adding bloopers towards the end so start listening for those!

item.title: Podcast Of Reckoning (Episode 2)
item.description: With this episode, Svoald and Orlock discuss the past weeks' news and feature a main topic of Where does WAR stand in the MMO battlefield? They discuss many game comparisons and how WAR may fare against other past/future releases. The last segment of this episode interviews Snazfg from The Greenskin Blog to find out what his response is. The closing parody features Warhammer Geek's latest release: Witch Elf Woman.

item.title: Podcast of Reckoning (Episode 1)
item.description: In the debuting podcast Svoald and Orlock introduce themselves with a topic of 'Who we are and Why we are here'. They start out with some official news, a best of the web segment, their main topic, and then a beefy interview with Wrenn and Leggy from www.warhammerconflict.com .
